ygData.subject: Re: Bardic guild on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: I was giving crested spaulders at level 7 or so. :) I was fighting and some higher bard stopped by, waited for me to finish and gave me the armor and ran away.
ygData.messageBody:
I was giving crested spaulders at level 7 or so. :) I was fighting and some
higher bard stopped by, waited for me to finish and gave me the armor and
ran away.
I like being a bard!

Thormael


>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bardic guild on Tunare
>Date: Wed, 20 Oct 1999 17:58:36 -0500
>
>One thing about being a bard.. people seem to be very nice to you, for some
>reason. A dwarf warrior gave me a small bronze cloak, and someone else
>gave
>me a Mithril Quill, both while I was just hanging out near the bank in
>Freeport waiting for someone. Others have giving me things, or 'traded'
>things as well, where it was obvious I was getting the better end of
>things.
>I hope this continues into the future. :) Maybe someone will be nice
>enough
>to give me some lambent armor. <wink, wink, nudge, nudge>
>
>Gaelaian
>Bard of the 10th Refrain, Tunare
